mapper.sql: id, job_id, job_type, class_type, start_plan_time, next_plan_time, status, plan_times, create_time, cron_id, cron_text,repository_id,is_run
mapper.insert: insert into km_task.task_quartz_set ( job_id, job_type, class_type, start_plan_time, next_plan_time, status, plan_times, create_time, cron_id, cron_text,repository_id,is_run) values ( #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startPlanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextPlanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cronId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cronText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isRun,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update km_task.task_quartz_set set plan_times=plan_times + 1 where plan_times is not null and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER};

update km_task.task_quartz_set
job_id = #{jobId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_type = #{jobType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_type = #{classType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_plan_time = #{startPlanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
next_plan_time = #{nextPlanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_times = #{planTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cron_id = #{cronId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cron_text = #{cronText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_run = #{isRun,jdbcType=INTEGER},
repository_id = #{repositoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
